attributes.action: Give Alex Stringer a proper home!
attributes.additional_details:
Alex Stringer who lost three limbs in a bomb blast in Afghanistan is living in a sixth-floor flat so cramped he can’t get around it in his wheelchair.

Thurrock council must find better and more suited accommodation for Alex!

rejection.details: See e-petition titled "Injured UK soldiers returning from war to be given priority over asylum seekers and non-British nationals for housing and financial assistance"
